ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes I would recommend this course to anyone interested in cell bio or research at Yale

This course introduces students to various research techniques and Yale laboratories. I would recommend that course to another student but as above I think the course need to include opportunities for the original researchers to discuss their research.
Yes, I would recommend this course. A great opportunity to work closely with a faculty member and present scientific information. A great way to learn about novel techniques and avenues of research
Yes! It is interesting course to get to know different aspects of cell biology and the various faculty at Yale.
This course focuses on reading primary literature, analyzing the methods and data, and presenting this.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It has introduced cutting edge research techniques. To date, little of the course will contribute to my dissertation.
Reading the primary literature and presenting scientific work is important for everybody in our program. It should help all of us.
